author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slides on U.S.-China trade talk uncertainty
text:
NEW YORK, May 22 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks ended lower on Tuesday as uncertainty lingered over trade talks between the United States and China and as energy and industrial shares fell.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 178.88 points, or 0.72 percent, to 24,834.41, the S&P 500 lost 8.57 points, or 0.31 percent, to 2,724.44 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 15.58 points, or 0.21 percent, to 7,378.46. (Reporting by Caroline Valetkevitch; Editing by Dan Grebler)
